name: Touring Car Challenge
overview: An addictive compelling Touring Car Management simulation. Touring Car Challenge gives you the opportunity to use your skill and judgement to manage a top Touring Car team, have your own on and off the circuit battles and perhaps influence the outcome of the championship, "if you're good enough." Select from any of the top teams, full drivers and manufacturers championship, 1-4 players, 4 difficulty levels, records and championship statistics. Setup your car, sign your driver and race!
